name: Moult
description:
In Moult you eat yourself and becomes stronger. You can play this game for as long as you want, there is no ending to it, keep feeding yourself by your own flesh and drowning in your own greed.

This is a side project I did in about 24h for JimJam with the theme Ouroborous. I also join another team and we made an awesome crafting game too! Check it out here: A tail of Alchemy
